name: Do Something
description:
You buy a game that you can pass to the end. Future updates are free of charge.

The game is an exploratory zombie shooter with puzzles.

After a few hours of epidemic, you go straight to the center to find a secret descent to the laboratory and destroy the virus...

You play as Alice, a former operative, who comes to the center of one place, where according to information there should be a secret path to the laboratory where they created the "D" virus.


- Navigate through dangerous terrain, planning your route as you go.
- Make it easy on yourself. Look for different keys and tools that will open up workarounds for you.
- Craft. You will decide which ammunition you need and how and use the found gunpowder.
- Realistic graphics and complete adaptation of the interface for 4K.
- Full Xbox/DualShock/DualSense gamepad support.
- AMD FSR support. Boost your frame rate with FidelityFX Super Resolution smart upscaling.
